notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was funded by the Colombian Corporation for Agricultural Research-AGROSAVIA, The Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development-MADR, project ID714: Development of production systems based on aromatic and medicinal species in agro-ecological associations with improved vegetable varieties (hot pepper, bean, and eggplant) for degraded soils of the Caribbean”, and project CT 80740-509-2019 funded by Patrimonio Fondo Nacional de Financiamiento para la Ciencia, la Tecnología y la Innovación “Francisco José de Caldas”-MINCIENCIAS.
